SEARCH
Package com.app.statistic

Interface Statistic<T,U>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of product being used in the statistic (usually Product)
U - the type of the value associated with the statistic (e.g., BigDecimal for prices)
All Known Implementing Classes:
StatisticImpl
public interface Statistic<T,U>
Interface representing a statistic for a collection of products with a specific type of value (e.g., price). The statistics include the minimum and maximum values (e.g., product prices), as well as average values. This interface provides methods for merging statistics, converting them to DTOs, and retrieving the minimum and maximum values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Product>
    getMax()
    Retrieves the list of products with the maximum value (e.g., the highest priced products).
    List<Product>
    getMin()
    Retrieves the list of products with the minimum value (e.g., the lowest priced products).
    Statistic<T,U>
    merge(Statistic<Product,BigDecimal> statistic)
    Merges the current statistic with another one, combining their minimum and maximum values.
    StatisticDto
    toStatisticDto(ProductsConverter productsConverterImpl)
    Converts the statistical data into a StatisticDto object for easier consumption on the client side.

  • Method Details

    • merge

      Statistic<T,U> merge(Statistic<Product,BigDecimal> statistic)
      Merges the current statistic with another one, combining their minimum and maximum values. This method is used to aggregate statistics from different data sources or categories.
      Parameters:
      statistic - the Statistic object to merge with
      Returns:
      the merged Statistic instance

    • toStatisticDto

      StatisticDto toStatisticDto(ProductsConverter productsConverterImpl)
      Converts the statistical data into a StatisticDto object for easier consumption on the client side. This DTO will contain the minimum and maximum values as well as the average.
      Parameters:
      productsConverterImpl - the converter used to transform product entities into DTOs
      Returns:
      a StatisticDto object containing the minimum, maximum, and average values

    • getMin

      List<Product> getMin()
      Retrieves the list of products with the minimum value (e.g., the lowest priced products).
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects that have the minimum value for the statistic

    • getMax

      List<Product> getMax()
      Retrieves the list of products with the maximum value (e.g., the highest priced products).
      Returns:
      a list of Product objects that have the maximum value for the statistic
